title: E-commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, payment processing, and order tracking. Built with Django REST framework and React.

title: Task Management App
description: A task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, user collaboration, and real-time updates. Built with Django, Django Channels, and PostgreSQL.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that displays current weather conditions and forecasts for multiple locations. Integrates with OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Blog Platform
description: A full-featured blog platform with markdown support, categories, tags, and user comments. Built with Django and deployed on AWS.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and professional experience. Features responsive design and modern UI elements.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application with private messaging, group chats, and file sharing. Built with Django, Django Channels, and WebSockets.

title: Fitness Tracker App
description: A mobile app for tracking workouts, setting fitness goals, and monitoring progress. Features include custom workout plans and progress analytics.

title: Task Management System
description: A task management system with features like task assignment, deadline tracking, priority setting, and team collaboration tools.

title: Food Delivery App
description: A food delivery application with restaurant listings, menu browsing, order placement, real-time tracking, and payment processing.

title: Travel Blog
description: A travel blog with content management system, photo galleries, interactive maps, and social media integration. Optimized for SEO.
